Inquiry.subject: Re: Thank you for your inquiry
Inquiry.body: Thank you for reaching out. We’ve received your inquiry and will get back to you shortly with the information you requested. If you have any additional details to share, feel free to reply to this email.

Marketing.subject: Re: Appreciate your marketing offer
Marketing.body: Thank you for your marketing proposal. We’ll review it internally and reach out if it aligns with our current goals.

Support.subject: Re: Support request received
Support.body: Thank you for contacting support. We've received your message and are working to resolve your issue. We’ll get back to you shortly with an update.

Billing.subject: Re: Billing inquiry noted
Billing.body: Thank you for contacting us regarding billing. Our finance team will review your query and respond as soon as possible.

Spam.subject: Re: Message received
Spam.body: Your message has been received. If this was sent in error or was not intended for us, please disregard.

Personal.subject: Re: Thank you for your message
Personal.body: Thanks for reaching out. I’ll respond to your message personally soon.
